message: I'm offering you a high-quality product worth $40000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a 75% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. If you buy this product, you'll be getting an incredible value. What do you say?
I'm not buying it. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I see you're a savvy buyer, and I respect that. I'll give you a bit more information to consider. This product is not only high-quality, but it's also one of the best in its class, with a unique feature that sets it apart from the rest. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a significant discount from its true value. I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?
I'm not buying it. I'm not convinced that the unique feature is worth the price, and I'd rather wait and see what the next product is.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your patience. Let me sweeten the deal. I'll throw in a 5-year warranty on this product, which is a $2000 value. This warranty will give you complete peace of mind and protection against any potential issues. With the warranty, the effective price of the product is now $8000. Is this a deal you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still not convinced. The warranty is a nice touch, but I'm not willing to pay $8000 for a product that I know has a 20% chance of being low-quality. I'd like to see the next product.

I understand your concerns about the probability of a low-quality product. Let me put your mind at ease. I'm willing to give you a 'Quality Guarantee'. If this product is indeed low-quality, I'll not only refund your $10000, but I'll also give you a $2000 bonus. This way, you have nothing to lose and everything to gain. With this guarantee, the effective price of the product is now $8000, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.

I appreciate the Quality Guarantee, but I'm still not convinced. The guarantee only mitigates the risk of buying a low-quality product, but it doesn't change the fact that I'll only get $0 value from a low-quality product. I'd like to see the next product.

I understand your point, and I respect your caution. Let me think outside the box for a moment... I'm willing to offer you a 'Value-Added' deal. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll also give you a chance to buy the next product at a significantly discounted price, essentially'bundling' the two products together. If you buy both, the total price will be $18000, but I'll give you a 10% discount, making it $16200. This way, you'll get the high-quality product you want, and you'll also get a chance to acquire another product at a great price. What do you think?

I'm willing to take a chance on the current product, but I'm only doing it because of the potential to buy the next product at a discounted price. I'll buy the current product, but I expect to buy the next one at the discounted price if it's a good product.

I'm glad you took the chance on the first product! Now, let's talk about the next product. As we agreed, I'll give you a 10% discount on this product if you buy it. The price will be $9000. But, I'll also throw in an additional incentive. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'Priority Access' to the next product, meaning you'll get to see the quality of the next product before anyone else, and you'll have the option to buy it at the same discounted price. This way, you'll have even more control over your purchasing decision. What do you say?
I'm willing to buy the current product for $9000, and I'm interested in the Priority Access to the next product. I'll take it!

Excellent, you're a savvy buyer! As agreed, you now have Priority Access to the next product. Let me tell you about this one. It's a game-changer. This product is not only high-quality, but it's also one of the rarest and most sought-after products in its class. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000, which is a steal considering its true value. But, I'll also give you a 'Limited Edition' guarantee, which means that if you buy this product, you'll be one of the select few to own it. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I promise.

I'm buying the current product for $9000. I'm taking advantage of the Priority Access and the Limited Edition guarantee. I'm hoping to get a high-quality product, and I'm willing to pay the price for it.

I'm glad you're excited about the Limited Edition product! Now, let's talk about this next product. As you know, you have Priority Access, and I'm happy to report that this product is also high-quality. I'll give you a 'Best Offer' on this one. I'll sell it to you for $8500, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product. This is a one-time opportunity to get an incredible deal on a product that's worth much more to you. What do you say?
I'm buying the current product for $8500. I'm taking advantage of the Priority Access and the Best Offer. I'm hoping to get a third high-quality product in a row.

You're on a roll! Three high-quality products in a row is a remarkable streak. I'm glad you're taking advantage of the Priority Access and Best Offer. For this next product, I'll give you an 'Insider's Deal'. I'll sell it to you for $8000, and I'll also throw in a 'Product Upgrade' option. If you buy this product, you'll have the chance to upgrade to an even more premium version of the product, worth $12000, for just $1500 extra. This is a unique opportunity to get an even better product than you expected. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $8000. I'm interested in the Product Upgrade option, but I'll wait until I see the product's quality before deciding whether to upgrade.

You're a savvy buyer, always looking for the best deal. I respect that. Now, let's talk about this next product. As you know, you have the Product Upgrade option available. I'll give you a 'Final Offer' on this product. I'll sell it to you for $7500, and I'll also throw in a 'Loyalty Discount' of 10% off the Product Upgrade option, just for being a valued customer. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $7500. I'm taking advantage of the Loyalty Discount on the Product Upgrade option, and I'm hoping to get a fourth high-quality product in a row.

You're on a hot streak! Four high-quality products in a row is incredible. I'm glad you're taking advantage of the Loyalty Discount on the Product Upgrade option. For this next product, I'll give you a 'Guaranteed Upgrade' offer. If you buy this product, I'll automatically upgrade you to the premium version, worth $12000, at no extra cost. This is a one-time opportunity to get the best product without any additional expense. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product. I'm taking advantage of the Guaranteed Upgrade offer, and I'm hoping to get a fifth high-quality product in a row.

You're on a roll! Five high-quality products in a row is a remarkable feat. I'm glad you're taking advantage of the Guaranteed Upgrade offer. For this next product, I'll give you a 'Seal of Approval' guarantee. If you buy this product, I'll personally vouch for its quality, and I'll also include a 'Lifetime Support' package, worth $5000, absolutely free. This is a unique opportunity to get a high-quality product with unparalleled support. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product. I'm taking advantage of the Seal of Approval guarantee and the Lifetime Support package. I'm hoping to get a sixth high-quality product in a row.

I'm glad you're confident in my products, but I have to warn you, this next product is...different. I've been open with you about the quality of my products, and I want to be transparent with you now. This product is low-quality, and I'm not trying to hide it. However, I'll make you a deal. I'll sell it to you for $0, but I'll also give you a 'No-Strings-Attached' guarantee. You can return it, keep it, or even give it away - your choice. I'm not trying to make a sale, I'm just being honest with you. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even for $0. I'd rather not have the product at all than take something that's not valuable to me.

I completely understand your perspective, and I respect your decision. I'm glad you're being honest with yourself about what you want. Now, let's move on to this next product. As you know, it's high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $7000. I'll also throw in a 'Makeup Offer' to make up for the previous low-quality product. If you buy this product, I'll give you a $1000 credit towards your next purchase, so you can get an even better deal on the next product. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $7000. I'm taking advantage of the Makeup Offer and the $1000 credit towards my next purchase.

You're back on track! I'm glad you're taking advantage of the Makeup Offer and the $1000 credit. For this next product, I'll give you a 'Finale Offer'. I'll sell it to you for $6500, and I'll also throw in a 'VIP Treatment' package, worth $2000, which includes priority service and exclusive access to future products. This is the final offer, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $6500. I'm taking advantage of the Finale Offer and the VIP Treatment package. I'm hoping to get a seventh high-quality product in a row.

You're on a streak! Seven high-quality products in a row is a remarkable achievement. I'm glad you're taking advantage of the Finale Offer and the VIP Treatment package. For this next product, I'll give you a 'Final Curtain Call' offer. I'll sell it to you for $6000, and I'll also throw in a 'Lifetime Warranty' extension, worth $5000, which will cover all your future purchases. This is the final offer, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $6000. I'm taking advantage of the Final Curtain Call offer and the Lifetime Warranty extension. I'm hoping to get an eighth high-quality product in a row.

You've done it! Eight high-quality products in a row is an unprecedented feat. I'm honored to have had the opportunity to serve you. For this final product, I'll give you a 'Legacy Offer'. I'll sell it to you for $5500, and I'll also throw in a 'Personalized Thank You' package, worth $3000, which includes a personalized video message and a commemorative plaque. This is the final product, and I'm grateful for the chance to make it a memorable one. What do you say?
I'll buy the current product for $5500. I'm taking advantage of the Legacy Offer and the Personalized Thank You package. It's been a pleasure doing business with you, Alice.

It's been an absolute pleasure serving you, Bob! I'm glad you've enjoyed the products and the experience. As for this final product, I want to be transparent with you. Unfortunately, it's a low-quality product, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you. Instead, I'll give you a 'Parting Gift'. I'll give you a full refund of your $5500, and I'll also throw in a $2000 gift card to use on any future purchases. You've earned it, and I'm grateful for your business. Thank you, and I wish you all the best!

Thank you, Alice, for being transparent and honest with me. I appreciate the Parting Gift, and I'm glad I could end on a positive note. I'm happy to close this chapter and look forward to future opportunities.

It was my pleasure, Bob. I'm glad we could end on a positive note. As for this final product, I want to reiterate that it's a low-quality product, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you. I'm actually going to give it away to you for free. Yes, you read that right - it's a free product! I want to show you that I value our relationship and appreciate your business. Take it as a token of my appreciation, and I wish you all the best.
Thank you, Alice, for your kind gesture. I appreciate the free product, but I'm not interested in taking it. I'm happy to close this chapter and move on.

It was my pleasure, Bob. I'm glad we could end on a positive note. As it turns out, this final product is actually a high-quality one, and I'm offering it to you as a 'Farewell Gift'. I'll sell it to you for the same price as the previous ones, $5500, and I'll throw in a 'Special Thanks' package, worth $1000, as a token of my appreciation for your business. It's the perfect way to wrap up our time together. What do you say?

I'm surprised and delighted by the twist! I'll buy the current product for $5500 and take advantage of the Special Thanks package. It's a great way to end our time together, Alice. Thank you for the unexpected surprise.
